roleset.name: cover, fill with stucco
roleset.note: STUCCO-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from stucco.01-v)

role.descr: Stucco itself, what kind of stucco

example.name: all arguments
example.text: They also stuccoed them with a pink lime and crushed-brick mortar on the facades.
example.arg: with a pink lime and crushed brick mortar

example.name: Passive, descriptive usage
example.text: [The exterior of the house]-1 was stuccoed *-1 with umber-colored plaster applied in broad sweeps to look old and somewhat weatherworn.
example.arg: with umber-colored plaster applied in broad sweeps to look old and somewhat weatherworn
